name: Add user not in organization to project via CLI
description:
- Login with valid credentials via **UI**.
- Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user` via **UI**.
- Login with Bearer auth token via **CLI**.
- Create new project via **CLI**.

### Verify that:

- User **cannot** add registered user **not from organization** to project via **CLI**.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials via UI.
  • Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user via UI.
  • Login with Bearer auth token via CLI.
  • Create new project via CLI.

Verify that:

  • User cannot add registered user not from organization to project via CLI.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Add new project via apolo CLI
Message: ERROR: Illegal argument(s) (upstream request timeout)
statusTrace:
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:49: in wrapper
    result = await func(*args, **kwargs)
             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
tests/test_cases/steps/cli_steps/comonent_steps_impl/admin_steps.py:58: in cli_add_new_project
    assert result, error_message
           ^^^^^^
E   AssertionError: ERROR: Illegal argument(s) (upstream request timeout)

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:
tests/test_cases/tests_cli/test_project_structure_setup.py:272: in test_add_user_not_in_org_to_proj_cli
    await self._cli_steps.admin.cli_add_new_project(
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:58: in wrapper
    raise AssertionError(formatted_msg) from e
E   AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Add new project via apolo CLI
E   Message: ERROR: Illegal argument(s) (upstream request timeout)

steps.name: Verify Apolo CLI client is installed

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials via **UI**.
- Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user` via **UI**.
- Login with Bearer auth token via **CLI**.
- Create new project via **CLI**.

### Verify that:

- User **cannot** add registered user **not from organization** to project via **CLI**.
testStage.descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials via UI.
  • Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user via UI.

  • Create new project via CLI.

Verify that:
